attributes.action: No to Stratospheric aerosol & other geo-engineering weather interference plans.
attributes.additional_details: Cease researching and finding any Stratospheric aerosol, marine cloud release and other weather modification or solar blocking methods.  We do not consent.
attributes.background:
Weather geo-engineering is too much interference with the natural order. 
Releasing substances in the air is an opt-in to all persons below which is an unacceptable threat to health and wellbeing. This must not go ahead.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
